attributes.name: Intermediate 3 (Freestyle 1) - Saturday 11:45am
attributes.description:
NOTE: Please note there is a 30 minute Practice/Warmup before class
Practice/Warmup Time: 11:45am - 12:15pm
Class time: 12:15pm - 12:45pm

Intermediate 3/Freestyle 1 Third Intermediate level skating class for ages 6-17

Class Curriculum:

  1. Backward outside edges
  2. Backward inside edges
  3. Two-foot spin
  4. Forward spiral
  5. Forward inside pivot
  6. Waltz jump

There is No refunds, make ups or credits for missed classes.
